name: Matthias Kaschube
content: Matthias Kaschube / FIAS Neuroscience - Research Groups to overview Research Group of Matthias Kaschube Dynamic neural representations Research in my group focuses on the following four topics: Developmental emergence of cortical representationsFlexible representations underlying learning, forgetting, and creativity Cognitive maps and representational spaces  Analysis methods for structural and functional neural data   Fellow Detail ResearchTeachingNews Join our group!You find our work interesting and would like to do your thesis with us?
